locations.english: We are based in Nairobi with branches in Kirinyaga, Nanyuki, and Nakuru.
locations.swahili: Tuko Nairobi na branches huko Kirinyaga, Nanyuki, na Nakuru. Karibu sana, rafiki!

delivery.english: We deliver within Nairobi, the entire Central region of Kenya, and the Rift Valley.
delivery.swahili: Tunafanya delivery Nairobi, Central mzima, na Rift Valley. Bidhaa inafika haraka haraka!

greetings.english: Hello! Welcome to Turning Point Agrovet ðŸ‘‹ We're your trusted partner for quality farm inputs and expert advice.
greetings.swahili: Niaje! Karibu Turning Point Agrovet ðŸ‘‹ Tuko hapa kwa bidhaa bora na ushauri wa kilimo wa kitaalam.

response.english:
We are open Mondayâ€“Saturday: 8:00 AM to 6:00 PM
Sunday: 9:00 AM to 2:00 PM
response.swahili:
Tufunguliwa Jumatatuâ€“Jumamosi: 8 asubuhi hadi 6 jioni

response.english: We accept M-Pesa, cash on delivery, and bank transfer. Just type 'Buy' after asking about any product to pay instantly via M-Pesa!
response.swahili: Tunakubali M-Pesa, cash wakati wa delivery, na bank transfer. Andika 'Buy' baada ya kuuliza bidhaa yoyote ili ulipe M-Pesa mara moja!

response.english: Yellow leaves in maize usually mean Nitrogen deficiency or Maize Lethal Necrosis (MLND). Top-dress with CAN fertilizer or bring a sample for soil test. Any other symptoms?
response.swahili: Majani ya mahindi yakigeuka njano mara nyingi ni ukosefu wa Nitrogen au MLND. Weka CAN mbolea ya juu au ulete sample tufanyie soil test. Kuna dalili zingine?

response.english: Fall Armyworm destroys maize fast. Use Rocket, Coragen or Belt insecticides. Spray early morning and repeat after 7â€“10 days. Act quickly!
response.swahili: Viwavi (Fall Armyworm) huharibu mahindi haraka. Tumia dawa kama Rocket, Coragen au Belt. Nyunyizia asubuhi na urudie baada ya siku 7-10.

response.english: Coughing/sneezing in chickens could be CRD or Newcastle disease. Isolate sick birds immediately and treat with Tylodox, Aliseryl or Doxy-Gen. How many are affected?
response.swahili: Kuku wakikohoa au kupumua vibaya inaweza kuwa CRD au Newcastle. Watenge mara moja na utumie Tylodox, Aliseryl au Doxy-Gen. Wangapi wana shida?

response.english: Low milk? Give plenty of clean water, quality Dairy Meal, and minerals like Fosflow or Maclik. Check for mastitis too. What's their current feed?
response.swahili: Maziwa kidogo? Hakikisha maji safi ya kutosha, Dairy Meal poa, na madini kama Fosflow au Maclik. Angalia pia tezi. Unawalisha nini sasa?

response.english: Mastitis: swollen udder, clotted milk or blood. Use intramammary tubes like Tetra-Delta or Noroclox. Call vet if severe.
response.swahili: Tezi (mastitis): tezi kuvimba, maziwa kuganda au damu. Tumia sindano za ndani kama Tetra-Delta au Noroclox. Piga daktari kama ni mbaya.

response.english: Deworm cattle every 3 months, poultry every 2 months. We stock Valbazen, Nilzan Plus and Piperazine.
response.swahili: Punguza minyoo kwa ng'ombe kila miezi 3, kuku kila miezi 2. Tuko na Valbazen, Nilzan Plus na Piperazine.

response.english: Foot rot causes limping and bad smell. Use Terramycin spray or foot bath with copper/zinc sulphate. Keep dry.
response.swahili: Miguu kuoza husababisha kuchechea na harufu mbaya. Tumia Terramycin spray au loweka miguu kwenye copper/zinc sulphate. Weka kavu.

response.english: For aphids, caterpillars or tuta absoluta, use Duduthrin, Rocket or Belt. Apply early morning. Which crop?
response.swahili: Kwa tuta, viwavi au wadudu wengine, tumia Duduthrin, Rocket au Belt. Nyunyizia asubuhi mapema. Ni mazao gani?
